# Muthu Kumar K - Senior MERN Stack & Full Stack Developer

> "**Building Scalable, High-Performance Web Applications**"

## About
Muthu Kumar K is a highly skilled Senior MERN Stack Developer with over 4+ years of experience. He specializes in building robust, scalable web applications using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) and Laravel. Based in Pudukkottai, Tamil Nadu, India.

## Key Skills
- **Frontend**: React.js, Redux, TailwindCSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, CSS3
- **Backend**: Node.js, Express.js, Laravel (PHP), REST API Development
- **Database**: MongoDB, MySQL
- **Tools**: Git, GitHub, Postman, VS Code, Netlify, Vercel
- **Cloud/DevOps**: Basic AWS/DigitalOcean experience (implied)

## Experience Highlights
- **Senior MERN Stack Developer** (Current): Leading development of complex web solutions.
- **Full Stack Developer**: Delivered multiple projects including e-commerce platforms, portfolio sites, and business management tools.
